name: Save to DB
Gumb za navigaciju
info:
This function node creates multiple INSERT INTO
commands for data points that are stored in 
attributes of the payload.

name: Spremanje vlažnosti u bazu, te prikaz mjerenja
info:
This flow section shows how to back up the graph
state to a local file and restore that at startup.
This loads the last graph state so you don't get
the "No data" screen after node red restart.

name: Save to DB
Save to DB
Save to DB
Naslov
format:
<script id="clockScript1" type="text/javascript">
    var clockInterval;
    $(function () {
        if (clockInterval) return;

        //add logo
       var div1 = $('<div/>');
    
        var logo = new Image();

        logo.src = '/home/pi/Slike/ner.jpg'
        logo.height = 60;
        div1[0].style.margin = '10px auto';

        div1.append();

        //add clock
        var div2 = $('<div/>');
        var p = $('<p/>');

        div2.append(p);
        div2[0].style.margin = '10px';
       
      

        function displayTime() {  
            
            p.text("DISTRIBUIRANI SUSTAV ZA MJERENJE PARAMETARA OKOLIŠA NEREŽIŠĆA ");
        }
        
        clockInterval = setInterval(displayTime, 1000);

        //add to toolbar when it's available
        var addToToolbarTimer;
        
        function addToToolbar() {
            var toolbar = $('.md-toolbar-tools');
            
            if(!toolbar.length) return;
            
            toolbar.append(div1);
            toolbar.append(div2);
            clearInterval(addToToolbarTimer);
        }
        addToToolbarTimer = setInterval(addToToolbar, 100);
    });
</script>
<style>
p {
  text-align: center;
  font-size:25px;
}

</style>
